title: Looking for a serious ranked team
body: I'm looking for a ranked team to play with to start off the new season, my main roles are Top/Jungle/Support, comms are preferred and a decent attitude. Add me in game if you are interested.

replies.body: Heya im interested, currently in a game but i will add you afterwards. I'm currently a top/mid main however i'm very fluid with my role as i have pretty much every champion in the game and i'm good at adapting to where im needed. I can last hit pretty well and hold a very good history in keeping high CS / gold leads in premade 5s.

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Jekyll,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=lvX4kqtJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T08:58:18.105+0000)

> Heya im interested, currently in a game but i will add you afterwards. I'm currently a top/mid main however i'm very fluid with my role as i have pretty much every champion in the game and i'm good at adapting to where im needed. I can last hit pretty well and hold a very good history in keeping high CS / gold leads in premade 5s.
